graphql.query:
mutation (
    $orcid: String!, 
    $email: String!, 
    $password: String!,
    $firstname: String!,
    $lastname: String!,
    $position: String!,
    $phone: String!,
    $nationality: Int!
) {
  createUser(
    user_title: "Ms."
    firstname: $firstname
    preferredname: $firstname
    lastname: $lastname
    password: $password
    orcid: $orcid
    orcidHash: ""
    refreshToken: ""
    gender: "female"
    nationality: $nationality
    birthdate: "2000-01-01"
    organisation: 7
    department: "QA"
    position: $position
    email: $email
    telephone: $phone
    )
    {
        user
        {
          id
          email
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation ($shortCode: String!, $startDate: DateTime!, $endDate: DateTime!, $comment: String!, $templateId: Int) {
  createCall (
    shortCode:$shortCode
    startCall: $startDate
    endCall: $endDate
    startReview: $startDate
    endReview: $endDate
    startNotify: $startDate
    endNotify: $endDate
    startCycle: $startDate
    endCycle: $endDate
    cycleComment: $comment
    surveyComment: "Test"
    templateId: $templateId
  )
  {
    call {
      id
      shortCode
      startCall
    }
    error
  }
}
